Plot: A contemporary story of love, rejection and triumph as a young Maori girl fights to fulfill a destiny her grandfather refuses to recognize.
Title: Whale Rider
Actors: Keisha Castle-Hughes, Rawiri Paratene, Vicky Haughton, Cliff Curtis
tomatoConsensus: An empowering and uplifting movie, with a wonderful performance by Castle-Hughes.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 32 wins & 32 nominations.
